ygData.subject: Re: Reinforcements
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Skulletron. Slow down. We are leaveing here soon enough. First I need to know if there are any preds in the brig that we can take with us.

::Feline::

She looked at Skulletron. "Slow down. We are leaveing here soon 
enough. First I need to know if there are any preds in the brig that 
we can take with us. Second, enhance your calm. I have HotRod and 
Cybershark on our side now.  We shall all get out of here soon 
enough. Now tell me, how many bots are in the brig down below?"











--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Lavacons::
> 
>              All of the Lavacons dodged the path of Oblitertron 
quickly, as
> well as any shots.  Man, a giant robot.
> 
>        Astral flew up into the air, as did Fenox.
> 
>        "Oblitertron, I've faced gestalts like you before, you 
scum!!!!!
> We'll take you down!!!!" Then, Fenox tapped Astral's shoulder.  He 
turned.
> 
>       "Ah.....Zardus, is it???  Alliance commander???  You think 
you can
> beat us????  Well, let me tell you something.  I didn't come here, 
to fight.
> I came here, to carry out an experiment.  But if I must fight, 
then, so help
> me Matrix, I'll fight.  As long as I, Admiral of the Lavacons, 
Astral, live,
> NOBODY IS TAKING ME DOWN!!!!  AND NOT TONIGHT!!!!!!" He said, and 
then
> nodded at everybody.
> 
>      Fenox sent a transmission to the others on the ground.
> 
>       "Ok, I'm afraid it's the only way, team!!!" He said.
> 
>     They all replied with a positive answer and then, everyone said 
all
> together, "LAVA AND FIRE UNITE!!!!!!!!!!  BURN!!!!!!  LET THE 
DARKNESS
> CONTROL THE HEAT!!!!" Then, suddenly, things started happening.
> 
>        The Lavacons' bodies started changing a bit(ok, a lot).  
Their optics
> went redder, and not just firey red, the normal way, they were 
evillish red.
> And, all of their bodies changed from burning reds and oranges, to 
evil,
> evil, blacks and reds.  An evil grin spread across each one's face, 
being
> shown only by the fire in each one's mouth.
> 
>       Astral, or, what was Astral, said, "HHHHAAAHHHHAAAA!!!!!!!
> MUAHAHA!!!!  Oblitertron.....Oh, stupid Oblitertron!!!!  Stupid
> Zardus!!!!!!!  AHAH!!!  Now, you've caused us to reach one of our 
superior
> forms!!!!!  HAHAHA!!!!!!  Now, we are the Dark Lavacons!!!!!
> HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!HAAAAHAAAHAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!
> OHHAAAA!!!!!" He laughed, evilishly.
> 
>           "Come on Dark Lavacons, while we crush these Alliance 
fools, we
> can have fun at the same time!!!" Astral said, laughing.
> 
>       Recklessa was even more dangerous now.  She grabbed her 
gatling guns
> and fired around the area, burning all the trees and stuff down.
> 
>        Griplash grabbed his sword, and cut through trees, 
destroying stuff.
> 
>      Starlight cackled as she shot her crossbow everywhere, making 
the
> ground go on fire.
> 
>      Fenox fired his optic lazers at Zardus, except, being a Dark 
Lavacon,
> Fenox didn't put any major effort into it, no feel.  Just fired it 
for the
> hell of destroying things.
> 
>        Astral laughed so evil, as he was in the air, firing flame 
rockets
> everywhere in sight.
> 
>         The Dark Lavacons are completely evil, the only thing they 
want to
> do is destroy things, they will even shoot at eachother, the 
shooter not
> caring, and the one getting hit not carring.  DESTROY is their main 
theme.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Skulletron::
> 
>        Skulletron suddenly started to wake up.  Uggh, where was he??
(He's in
> a CR right???)  Ah ha, he was in a CR Chamber.  He wanted to get 
out, he
> better be careful.  He stepped out of the CR, and started running, 
to
> Feline's workshop(or where ever the hell she was).
> 
>      He looked at Hot Rod, then at Feline.
> 
>      "Fe...Fe..Line......Feline........Man, am I GLAD to see 
you!!!  Help
> me!!!!  QUICK!!!!  What do I do....These Maxi's will be all over me 
now, I
> ran as fast as I possibly could to get here, to hide.  Cover me??" 
Then,
> Skulletron looked at Hot Rod again.
> 
>      "Wow, Hot Rod, lookin' good!!!" He commented.
